botMessages.message: Hi {!Contact.FirstName}! I'm Luna, your renewable energy bot.
Which of your cases would you like to check?
Ok, I can connect you with an expert. Before I transfer you, please tell me a little bit about what you need so that I can find someone with the right skills to help you.

retryMessages.message: Please type a summary of what you need so that I can find someone to help you.

botMessages.message: Ask me something, or choose from the selections below.
Sorry, I didn't understand that.
What comment would you like to add to this Case?
Your comment has been added to Case #{!Selected_Case.CaseNumber}. The case owner will reply to your message shortly.
Goodbye! Click the "X" button at the top right and select "End Conversation" to end this chat.
Anything else I might be able to help with?
Unfortunately, there are no agents available at the moment
Unfortunately, a system error occurred. Let's start again.
I'm sorry, I can't find any records on file for you.
Ok, Case #{!Selected_Case.CaseNumber} about "{!Selected_Case.Subject}" is now {!Case.Status}
😲 Oh my! Such language!
You betcha. Anything else I can help you with?
Okay
Are you sure you want to reset your password?

retryMessages.message: Sorry, I just want to make sure I understood you. Reply with Yes if you would like to reset your password, or No if this isn't what you want to do.

botMessages.message: Ok, check your email {!Contact.FirstName}. I've just sent you a password reset link.
Your current Mobile Phone is {!Contact.MobilePhone} What would you like to change it to?

retryMessages.message: Please enter a telephone number in the format XXX-XXX-XXXX

botMessages.message: Ok, you're all set. We've updated your Mobile Phone to {!Contact.MobilePhone}.
Your current Email is {!Contact.Email} What would you like to change it to?

retryMessages.message: Please enter an email address like sample@domain.net -- Thanks!

botMessages.message: Ok, you're all set. We've updated your Email to {!Contact.Email}

Your current Mailing Address is {!Contact.MailingAddress.Street}, {!Contact.MailingAddress.City}, {!Contact.MailingAddress.State} {!Contact.MailingAddress.PostalCode} What would you like to change it to?

retryMessages.message: Please provide your full address, for example 1600 Pennsylvania Avenue, Washington, DC 20500. Be sure to include street number, street name, city, state, and ZIP code.

botMessages.message: Street?
City?
State?
ZIP?
Ok, you're all set. We've updated your Mailing Address to {!Contact.MailingAddress.Street}, {!Contact.MailingAddress.City}, {!Contact.MailingAddress.State} {!Contact.MailingAddress.PostalCode}
Please provide an email address that I might have on file for you.
OK, got it, {!Contact.FirstName}.
What type of appointment would you like to make?

retryMessages.message: Please choose Repair, Maintenance or Installation.

botMessages.message: Which type of product do you need us to work on?

retryMessages.message: Please choose a standard product type like Solar Panel, Wind Turbine or Battery Backup.

botMessages.message: What type of work do you need us to perform?

retryMessages.message: Please clarify what type of work you need us to help with during the appointment.

botMessages.message: When and at what time would you like me to schedule the appointment?

retryMessages.message: Can you run that by me again? What date and time work well for you?
Sorry, I still didn't get it. Please tell me when you want the appointment. You can say something like Tuesday at 9am or June 15th at 12:00pm for example.

botMessages.message: We have an opening at that time. We are looking forward to seeing you during our upcoming visit.

🧠 We are having a 25% off sale on Battery Backup systems. Since we are coming out for your repair, we could also add one to your home energy system. Would you like to talk to an expert about this promotion?

retryMessages.message: Would you like me to connect you with an expert now?

botMessages.message: Here are some locations near you. Tap on one to see more details.
This location is open from {!Location.Opening_Time__c} to {!Location.Closing_Time__c} {!Location.TimeZone} Call or Text us at this location: {!Location.Phone__c}
{!LocationAddress.Street} {!LocationAddress.City}, {!LocationAddress.State}, {!LocationAddress.PostalCode}, {!LocationAddress.Country}
Directions: https://maps.google.com/?q={!Location.Latitude}%2C{!Location.Longitude}
Which of your orders would you like to check?

retryMessages.message: Please select one of the existing orders I listed above.

botMessages.message: Sorry it didn't work out.
Please let us know your reason for returning this order so that we can do better next time.

retryMessages.message: Please tell me the reason you are returning this order.

botMessages.message: Please select your preferred repayment method.

retryMessages.message: How would you like us to reimburse you for the order?

botMessages.message: Ok, I've submitted your return order. Please ship the product back to us and we will process your {!Repayment_Method} as soon as we receive your shipment.
I can help answer your questions. What would you like to know?
Here are some articles that talk about that. Tap on one to learn more.

Here is a snippet -
...{!Knowledge_Article.Chat_Answer__c}...

botDialogs.description: This dialog captures a customer question and searches for a related knowledge article.
botDialogs.label: 📚 Search Knowledge

botMessages.message: Ok, I'd like to run an automated Health Check on your 4-Panel Solar Starter Kit. Please be aware that power fluctuations may occur during this process. Are you ready to get started?

retryMessages.message: When would you like to run the health check? Select one of the options above.

botMessages.message: Ok, it looks like your energy production is lower than we would expect for your area. This is usually due to a simple adjustment to the angle of your solar panels. Would you like to learn more?

retryMessages.message: Would you like to explore this solution? Select one of the options above.

botMessages.message: Ok, let's begin.
First, loosen the large black knobs on the back of your solar panel to allow the angle adjustment. Let me know when you are ready for the next step.

retryMessages.message: Are you ready to move to the next step?

botMessages.message: Now slide them back as far as they will go. Listen for them to click into position and then twist those black knobs down nice and tight so your panels stay put! Make sense?

retryMessages.message: Did you complete that last step?

botMessages.message: All set! I will monitor your solar panels for the next 24 hours to make sure we see a boost in energy production and send you a text message tomorrow with an update.
That email address matched multiple records. Which of these looks correct to you?
OK, got it, {!Contact.FirstName}.

I couldn't find any records with that email address. If I can't identify you, I won't be able to provide you service directly, but I can pass you to an agent. Would you like to try another email address?

retryMessages.message: Please select Yes or No.

botMessages.message: Select the file you'd like to attach to the case by clicking the file attachment icon below. You may upload .pdf, .png, or .jpeg files up to 5MB.

retryMessages.message: Let's try that again. I can accept .pdf, .png, or .jpeg files of up to 5MB.
Sorry, I'm still not getting it. Please try again.

botMessages.message: OK, I've added that file to Case {!Selected_Case.CaseNumber}. There are a total of {!TotalCaseFiles} files attached to that case now. Files are available on the Related tab of the case.
Would you like to upload another file to the case?
I can provide a document that summarizes that information.
I wasn't able to identify you automatically.
